metadata.title: USN-4966-1 -- libx11 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libx11 incorrectly validated certain parameter lengths. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to trick libx11 into emitting extra X protocol requests.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4966-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libx11-6 - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.2 libx11-data - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.2 libx11-xcb-dev - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.2 libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.2 libx11-doc - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.2 libx11-6-udeb - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.2 libx11-dev - 2:1.6.9-2ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
